titleStmt.title: The history of Scotland written in Latin by George Buchanan ; faithfully rendered into English.
Rerum Scoticarum historia. English
titleStmt.author: Buchanan, George, 1506-1582.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones, for Awnsham Churchil ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
Includes: The life of George Buchanan, written by himself two years before his death.
